name: website-pages
description: Simple website pages implemented as a React SPA. The 'start' script is configured to run the Node.js server (index.js) which serves the built React application for deployment. Frontend development with Vite, build, and linting scripts are also included.

scripts.trae:prepare: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.trae:commit: git add . && git commit -m "[TRAE-AUTO] automated changes" || echo Nothing to commit
scripts.trae:prepare-and-push: npm run trae:prepare && npm run trae:commit && npm run trae:push
